definition: abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
bead/pearl/CL:粒[li4],顆|颗[ke1]
(of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
old variant of 峰[feng1]

sentences.english: Universally terrifying , it is the most dangerous part of the southern route on Everest.
sentences.chinese: 每一处都令人胆战心惊，这是珠峰南线最危险的地段。

sentences.english: He was climbing with his father and three Sherpa guides.
sentences.chinese: 他和他父亲以及其他三个夏巴导游一起登珠峰。

sentences.english: Every step is critical on Mount Everest.
sentences.chinese: 珠峰上的每一步都很关键。

sentences.english: He only started on Everest when aged in his 60s.
sentences.chinese: 在60多岁时，他才开始尝试攀登珠峰。

sentences.english: Fiennes climbed the mountain to raise funds for cancer charity Marie Curie.
sentences.chinese: 他此次攀登珠峰是为了给居里癌症基金会筹款。

sentences.english: Rongbuk Glacier around this area is also the largest among all the glaciers here.
sentences.chinese: 而在绒布寺附近的冰川是珠峰最大的冰川群。

sentences.english: It shows that Mount Qomolangma region is much cleaner than Beijing and is rarely influenced by human activities.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，人类活动对珠峰地区的影响很小。

sentences.english: It does not need to be after Qomolangma and could be in between.
sentences.chinese: 不一定要在珠峰之后，也可能交替进行。

sentences.english: This peculiar phenomenon of Mt. Everest is known as 'Flag Cloud'.
sentences.chinese: 珠峰这种特有的现象，被称为“云旗”。

sentences.english: Comparing to Everest, Shishapangma is a much less climbed mountain and the south face is even less so.
sentences.chinese: 相比于珠峰，爬希夏邦马的就少多了，特别是南坡。

sentences.english: Are you a supporter of the Olympic Torch going to Mt. Everest?
sentences.chinese: 您是否支持奥运圣火登珠峰？

sentences.english: At the foot of Mt. Everest is located the highest temple in the world, Rongbuk Monastery.
sentences.chinese: 在珠峰的山脚，有一座世界上最高的寺庙叫绒布寺。

sentences.english: Apparently you have to drop $60k to climb Everest these days but it's probably worth it, wouldn't you say?
sentences.chinese: 现在爬珠峰需要花六万美元，这个价钱很值，你说呢？

sentences.english: This is one of Peng Liyuan's representative works of singing.
sentences.chinese: 这是彭丽媛演唱珠峰的成功作品。

sentences.english: Yesterday we asked you which mountain range Mount Everest is part of?
sentences.chinese: 昨天我们问了珠峰属于哪个山系。

sentences.english: Maybe it's time for some waste treatment plants right in the Everest region.
sentences.chinese: 这许真的该在珠峰地区修建垃圾处理厂了。

definition: Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Mt Shishapangma or Xixiabangma in Tibet (8012 m)
Meilixue or Meri snow mountains, with peaks up to 6000 m., in Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
Mt Haba (Nakhi: golden flower), in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Gonggar county, Tibetan: Gong dkar rdzong, in Lhokha prefecture 山南地區|山南地区[Shan1 nan2 di4 qu1], Tibet
K2, Mt Qogir or Chogori in Karakorum section of Himalayas
Lhotse Mountain, between Tibet and Nepal
Himalayas
Mt Kawakarpo (6740 m) in Yunnan, the highest peak of Meri snow mountains 梅里雪山[Mei2 li3 xue3 shan1]
Mt Kilimanjaro in Tanzania
pinyin: Qi3 li4 ma3 zha1 luo2 shan1

definition: Namtso or Lake Nam (officially Nam Co), mountain lake at Nakchu in central Tibet
Chola Mountains in Sichuan
Namcha Barwa (Himalayan mountain)
Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau
Mt Gang Rinpoche in Tibet/also called Mount Kailash
